node.html:
• Contribute to Ion Platform's development and maintenance, Infomo's ad serving solution for web property monetization with targeted ads.
  • Develop Exchange JS, a client-side tech that seamlessly integrates ads into web pages, driving engagement and revenue growth for Infomo's clients.

• Write modern, performant, maintainable code for a diverse array of clients and internal projects.
  • Work with a variety of different languages, platforms and frameworks such as JavaScript, React, React Native, Node.js, Flutter, Angular and PHP.
  • Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of developers, designers and clients on a daily basis.
